author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Adam welcomes Star Wars puppet builder and cosplayer Darren Moser (aka @drscifi ) to the cave to meet his incredible life-size K-2SO build, which Darren can control and puppet at conventions, film events, and other fan gatherings! K-2SO feels larger than life when it gets up close and personal, and Darren shows us how he has refined his puppet to give it the same distinct character and personality as the on-screen droid!

Find Darren's other builds and projects: http://www.drscifi.com/ https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEmlBCbLwocSEWNi3oZ6WGw and https://www.instagram.com/drscifi/

Shot and edited by Josh Self
Music by Jinglepunks

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

Savage Merchandis
title: Adam Savage in Awe of This Life-Size K-2SO Cosplay!
